data.text:
Okay ☆ Now everything is ready ♪ 
Everyone, come over here!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Okay ☆ Now everything is ready ♪ 
<story>Everyone, come over here!

data.text:
Woah! Are we eating outside!? 
It's kind of cold though…!
data.name: Children
data.processed:
<story>Woah! Are we eating outside!? 
<story>It's kind of cold though…!

data.text:
It'll be fine! We'll have a snowball fight to warm ourselves up ☆ 
Anyone who wants to play with me come over here ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>It'll be fine! We'll have a snowball fight to warm ourselves up ☆ 
<story>Anyone who wants to play with me come over here ♪

data.text:
Everyone, eat as much as you like. The food my 
fans made… it's so delicious. I recommend the 
stew. I've already had 30 bowls of it.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Everyone, eat as much as you like. The food my 
<story>fans made… it's so delicious. I recommend the 
<story>stew. I've already had 30 bowls of it.

data.text:
Ahaha! Oguri, you're eating way too much ☆ 
But I guess you're always eating too much ★ 
There must be a black hole inside of you ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Oguri, you're eating way too much ☆ 
<story>But I guess you're always eating too much ★ 
<story>There must be a black hole inside of you ☆ ★

data.text:
We made sure to prepare a lot of food specifically for Oguri-san, 
so please eat to your heart's content!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>We made sure to prepare a lot of food specifically for Oguri-san, 
<story>so please eat to your heart's content!

data.text:
That's fine, but… why did I have to dress up as Santa too? 
Mayano, how many outfits did you girls bring? Wait a sec, why 
did you bring these in the first place?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>That's fine, but… why did I have to dress up as Santa too? 
<story>Mayano, how many outfits did you girls bring? Wait a sec, why 
<story>did you bring these in the first place?

data.text:
Come on, don't worry about the details. After all, you look great 
in Santa's clothing. It's quite adorable.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Come on, don't worry about the details. After all, you look great 
<story>in Santa's clothing. It's quite adorable.

data.text: …! I'm taking these off!
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: <story>…! I'm taking these off!

data.text:
Jeez… Anyways, Hayahide, when you get excited you start acting 
like an old man. Did you know that?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Jeez… Anyways, Hayahide, when you get excited you start acting 
<story>like an old man. Did you know that?

data.text:
That is quite an awful evaluation… Regardless, would you mind 
fixing your mood and getting back into the Santa outfit? I want 
to send a picture of us to Ticket.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>That is quite an awful evaluation… Regardless, would you mind 
<story>fixing your mood and getting back into the Santa outfit? I want 
<story>to send a picture of us to Ticket.

data.text: She never did end up making it, did she…?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>She never did end up making it, did she…?

data.text:
That might not be the case… don't you hear that? 
It's a real annoying sound after all…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>That might not be the case… don't you hear that? 
<story>It's a real annoying sound after all…

data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
Ah, I can hear it now. I see… 
The miracles continue to happen, don't they?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I can hear it now. I see… 
<story>The miracles continue to happen, don't they?

data.text:
Ahh, that was so much fun ♪ 
I'm so glad that we got to 
enjoy the party with everyone, Marve-chin ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Ahh, that was so much fun ♪ 
<story>I'm so glad that we got to 
<story>enjoy the party with everyone, Marve-chin ♪

data.text:
Me too ☆ We also got to see that huge star as well! I thought 
that would be the end of it, then that happened…
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Me too ☆ We also got to see that huge star as well! I thought 
<story>that would be the end of it, then that happened…

data.text:
Oguri's take off was just so inspiring, wasn't it? ☆ 
Her heart is so big ★ ♪ And her tummy too ☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Oguri's take off was just so inspiring, wasn't it? ☆ 
<story>Her heart is so big ★ ♪ And her tummy too ☆

data.text:
Did you see the look on Oguri-san's fans' faces? It was like 
they were lost in a trance… focused solely on Oguri-san!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Did you see the look on Oguri-san's fans' faces? It was like 
<story>they were lost in a trance… focused solely on Oguri-san!

data.text:
Earlier I was working on an 
advertisement with this really handsome actor… 
His fans had the same look on their faces too.
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Earlier I was working on an 
<story>advertisement with this really handsome actor… 
<story>His fans had the same look on their faces too.

data.text:
Well… we also have to make sure everyone 
has a marvelous look on their faces too ☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Well… we also have to make sure everyone 
<story>has a marvelous look on their faces too ☆

data.text:
So… ☆ Why don't we… 
become him too?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>So… ☆ Why don't we… 
<story>become him too?

data.text:
Marve-chin, you're a genius ♪ 
Yup, let's do it☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Marve-chin, you're a genius ♪ 
<story>Yup, let's do it☆

data.text:
Heart-racing, dream-like, and dazzling! 
Combine all of that while giving presents to good kids…
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Heart-racing, dream-like, and dazzling! 
<story>Combine all of that while giving presents to good kids…

data.text: And we'll become Santa-san ♪
data.name: Mayano & Marvelous
data.processed: <story>And we'll become Santa-san ♪

data.text: Hmm? Oguri-san, are you heading outside?
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Oguri-san, are you heading outside?

data.text: Ah, I just wanted to see the starry sky again.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Ah, I just wanted to see the starry sky again.

data.text: Ah, okay! Make sure to not catch a cold!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Ah, okay! Make sure to not catch a cold!

data.text:
This is nice… Both inside and outside, 
the stars are dazzling.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>This is nice… Both inside and outside, 
<story>the stars are dazzling.

data.text:
This really was a lot of fun. I was able to 
hear all about how they feel about me.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>This really was a lot of fun. I was able to 
<story>hear all about how they feel about me.

data.text:
And I finally understood something. 
Why was I so happy during that one Christmas…? 
It was because Santa-san was proud of me for winning.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>And I finally understood something. 
<story>Why was I so happy during that one Christmas…? 
<story>It was because Santa-san was proud of me for winning.

data.text:
Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. 
Seeing you fly through the sky reminded me of how 
moved I was when I first witnessed one of your races.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. 
<story>Seeing you fly through the sky reminded me of how 
<story>moved I was when I first witnessed one of your races.

data.text:
Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. 
In your coming race… You'll definitely show me something 
even more magnificent than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. 
<story>In your coming race… You'll definitely show me something 
<story>even more magnificent than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.

data.text: Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!

data.text:
There's only one way to show everyone my appreciation for all 
that they've done for me today. I've finally decided on what to 
give them as a Christmas present.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>There's only one way to show everyone my appreciation for all 
<story>that they've done for me today. I've finally decided on what to 
<story>give them as a Christmas present.

data.text: I'm going to make a miracle happen.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I'm going to make a miracle happen.

data.text: A few days after the party…
data.processed: <story>A few days after the party…

data.text:
Now! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing 
in!! Somehow Oguri Cap has taken the lead!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Now! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing 
<story>in!! Somehow Oguri Cap has taken the lead!!

data.text:
With these legs of mine… 
I can bring my fans inspiration… happiness… and joy! 
That's the Christmas present that only I can give them…!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>With these legs of mine… 
<story>I can bring my fans inspiration… happiness… and joy! 
<story>That's the Christmas present that only I can give them…!

data.text:
Everyone, keep your eyes on me. 
I… Oguri Cap will make miracles happen!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Everyone, keep your eyes on me. 
<story>I… Oguri Cap will make miracles happen!

data.text: Haaaaaaaa!!!!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Haaaaaaaa!!!!

data.text:
As long as I continue to strive towards making miracles… 
my Christmas present will never stop giving.
data.processed:
<story>As long as I continue to strive towards making miracles… 
<story>my Christmas present will never stop giving.
